title: US discovers more anthrax shipments
description: The US military orders a review into how it handles anthrax, after discovering more cases of live anthrax sent to laboratories, including one in Australia.

title: US demands China halt reclamations
description: The US calls for an "immediate halt" to land reclamation in disputed areas of the South China Sea, saying China is "out of step" with international rules.

title: US removes Cuba from terror list
description: The United States has removed Cuba from its list of state sponsors of terror, allowing the country to conduct banking in the United States, among other activities.

title: US gunman deemed 'legally sane'
description: A court-appointed psychiatrist has testified the gunman who carried out a 2012 attack on a Colorado cinema was mentally ill but "legally sane" when it happened.

title: Silk Road drug site founder jailed
description: Ross Ulbricht, the founder of online illegal drug marketplace the Silk Road, is sentenced to life in prison.

title: US ex-speaker charged over payments
description: Former US House of Representatives speaker Dennis Hastert faces charges of lying to the FBI over secret payments to cover up "prior misconduct".

title: American Express president dies
description: American Express said its president, Ed Gilligan, died after becoming ill on a flight to New York

title: 'Success kid' raises cash for dad
description: Sam Griner, whose image spawned the 'success kid' meme, is using his fame to raise cash to pay for medical treatment for his father.

title: Tribeca festival begins in New York
description: New York's Tribeca Film Festival kicked off on Wednesday with the world premiere of Saturday Night Live documentary, Live from New York!.

title: Transplant man meets donor's sister
description: A woman, whose brother was killed in a car accident, has met the man who was given his face in a pioneering transplant operation.

title: VIDEO: US calls halt to land reclamation
description: The United States has called for an immediate and lasting halt to reclamation works by all claimants in disputed waters in the South China Sea.

title: VIDEO: Putin shows his support for Blatter
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has accused the US of trying to block Sepp Blatter from being re-elected as Fifa president.

title: VIDEO: 'Diblings' - the siblings created through donors
description: Being a 'dibling' - a child biologically connected through egg or sperm donation, can lead to a large family of half brothers and sisters, as the Victoria Derbyshire programme finds out.

title: VIDEO: Canada's 'early adopter' looks back
description: Former Canadian prime minister Brian Mulroney, described as "an early adopter" because of the reforms he made while in office, talks about his successes and failures.

title: VIDEO: US prosecutors accuse Fifa of fraud
description: US prosecutors accuse Fifa officials of racketeering, fraud and money laundering over a period of 24 years.

title: VIDEO: Texas dam reaches dangerous levels
description: Flood waters flow over a dam southwest of Dallas as a large part of the southern US continued to reel from floods brought on by powerful storms.

title: VIDEO: Aerial footage of swamped Houston
description: The mayor of Houston has asked the governor of Texas to declare the city a disaster area after flash floods left at least two people dead and turned streets into rivers.

title: VIDEO: Iraqi forces 'lack leadership'
description: Former NATO Supreme Allied Commander Admiral James Stavridis says Iraqi forces lack leadership in fight against IS

title: VIDEO: Many homes destroyed in US floods
description: Devastating floods have hit southern and central parts of the United States, killing three people and forcing thousands to leave their homes.

title: Is O'Malley just a Clinton back-up plan?
description: Former Maryland Governor Martin O'Malley is set to announce a presidential bid on Saturday. Could he challenge Hillary Clinton, or is he consigned to being his party's unlikely plan B.

title: US economy shrank in first quarter
description: US economy contracts 0.7% after higher imports and lower investment taken into account.

title: McDonald's faces worker protests
description: Thousands of workers and union supporters protest outside McDonald's headquarters, as the fast food firm continues to face wage pressure.

title: Canada country profile
description: Provides an overview of Canada, including key events and facts about the world's second-largest country

title: Puerto Rico profile
description: Provides and overview as well as facts and figures for this small dependency of the United States situated in the Caribbean

title: St Pierre and Miquelon profile
description: Provides an overview of what remains of France's once-extensive possessions in North America

title: United States country profile
description: Provides an overview of the United States, including key events and facts about this superpower

title: Why Latinos outlive their US peers
description: Why Latino immigrants live longer than their white neighbours

title: Corrupt Fifa official blogged travels
description: One corrupt football official's globe-hopping blog

title: New York City's ugly saviour
description: How demolishing Penn Station saved the rest of New York

title: VIDEO: The comedy side of getting to America
description: What's so funny about illegal immigration?

title: Only men at your event? This blog will shame you
description: The blog calling out gender imbalance on panels

title: The man who hid behind a trail name
description: How a US hiking tradition helped hide a fugitive
